CreateDiscoverer.name: CreateDiscoverer
CreateDiscoverer.description:
Creates an event schema discoverer. Once created, your events will be automatically
                                                map into corresponding schema documents

CreateRegistry.name: CreateRegistry
CreateRegistry.description: Create a new schema registry in your account.

CreateSchema.name: CreateSchema
CreateSchema.description: Create a new schema in your account.

DeleteRegistry.name: DeleteRegistry
DeleteRegistry.description: Deletes an existing registry in your account.

DeleteResourcePolicy.name: DeleteResourcePolicy
DeleteResourcePolicy.description: Delete the resource-based policy attached to a given registry.

DeleteSchema.name: DeleteSchema
DeleteSchema.description: Deletes an existing schema in your account.

DeleteSchemaVersion.name: DeleteSchemaVersion
DeleteSchemaVersion.description: Deletes a specific version of schema in your account.

DescribeCodeBinding.name: DescribeCodeBinding
DescribeCodeBinding.description: Retrieves metadata for generated code for specific schema in your account.

DescribeDiscoverer.name: DescribeDiscoverer
DescribeDiscoverer.description: Retrieves discoverer metadata in your account.

DescribeRegistry.name: DescribeRegistry
DescribeRegistry.description: Describes an existing registry metadata in your account.

DescribeSchema.name: DescribeSchema
DescribeSchema.description: Retrieves an existing schema in your account.

GetCodeBindingSource.name: GetCodeBindingSource
GetCodeBindingSource.description: Retrieves metadata for generated code for specific schema in your account.

GetDiscoveredSchema.name: GetDiscoveredSchema
GetDiscoveredSchema.description: Retrieves schema for the provided list of sample events.

GetResourcePolicy.name: GetResourcePolicy
GetResourcePolicy.description: Retrieves the resource-based policy attached to a given registry.

ListDiscoverers.name: ListDiscoverers
ListDiscoverers.description: Lists all the discoverers in your account.

ListRegistries.name: ListRegistries
ListRegistries.description: List all discoverers in your account.

ListSchemaVersions.name: ListSchemaVersions
ListSchemaVersions.description: List all versions of a schema.

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: This action lists tags for a resource.

PutCodeBinding.name: PutCodeBinding
PutCodeBinding.description: Generates code for specific schema in your account.

PutResourcePolicy.name: PutResourcePolicy
PutResourcePolicy.description: Attach resource-based policy to the specific registry.

SearchSchemas.name: SearchSchemas
SearchSchemas.description: Searches schemas based on specified keywords in your account.

StartDiscoverer.name: StartDiscoverer
StartDiscoverer.description:
Starts the specified discoverer. Once started the discoverer will automatically register
                                                schemas for published events to configured source in your account

StopDiscoverer.name: StopDiscoverer
StopDiscoverer.description:
Starts the specified discoverer. Once started the discoverer will automatically register
                                                schemas for published events to configured source in your account

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: This action removes a tag from on a resource.

UpdateDiscoverer.name: UpdateDiscoverer
UpdateDiscoverer.description: Updates an existing discoverer in your account.

UpdateRegistry.name: UpdateRegistry
UpdateRegistry.description: Updates an existing registry metadata in your account.

UpdateSchema.name: UpdateSchema
UpdateSchema.description: Updates an existing schema in your account.
